Subscription.Description: Spotting the Adversary with Windows Event Log Monitoring
Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="0"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP/Configuration">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP' or @Name='Microsoft-Windows-WLANAutoConfig'] and (Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=400 or EventID=410)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP/Diagnostic">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP' or @Name='Microsoft-Windows-WLANAutoConfig'] and (Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=400 or EventID=410)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP/Analytic">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP' or @Name='Microsoft-Windows-WLANAutoConfig'] and (Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=400 or EventID=410)]]</Select><Select Path="System">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP' or @Name='Microsoft-Windows-WLANAutoConfig'] and (Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=400 or EventID=410)]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
